collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (27 total Queries, 27 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT * FROM `tbl_position` WHERE `posID` = '1'

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Obtain a schedule of investments, split between investments in group undertakings and other investments. <b>(P)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Agree totals shown on the lead schedule to the trial balance and register of investments. <b>(E)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Agree comparative figures to the previous period’s statutory financial statements. <b>(V)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Review investments for reasonableness and consistency. Consider whether any debt instrument included within investments would be more appropriately classified as debtors. <b>(C, E &P)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Revisit the risk assessment, materiality calculation and assignment plan and update as appropriate where matters have been identified during the assignment.</p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Ensure key findings from this section are included in the draft letter of representation, points for the management letter and points for A.E.P.’s attention.</p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Ensure that the conclusion is appropriate.<b>(P)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>If available, consider obtaining the Type 2 Report from the investment manager(s) or custodian(s). Review the report(s) and based on the assurance obtained on the effectiveness and reliability of the controls in place, consider the extent to which tests 9 to 12 need to be completed. Ensure that the relevant tests on the N section Audit Programme have been completed to document consideration of the use of a service organisation. <b>(E, R&O, C, V)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Agree shareholdings to share certificates or other suitable documentation. <b>(E, R & O)</b></p>\r\n<i>This test is required for subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates, as well as other investments.</i>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Check a sample of purchases to supporting documentation.<b>(E, R & O)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Check a sample of disposals to contract notes and bank receipts, and ensure that the profit / loss has been correctly calculated. <b>(C, V)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>For listed investments which must be carried at fair value, vouch period end values to published data using ‘bid’ prices. <b> (V)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Check whether items denoted in a foreign currency have been translated at the correct rate. <b> (V)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Ensure the audit file justifies the classification of investments as: subsidiaries, associates, joint ventures and other investments. <b>(D, V).</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>For investments in subsidiaries, associates and joint venture ensure that the entity has valued them at either:-</p> <ul> <li>Cost; or</li> <li>Fair value through profit or loss; or</li> <li>Fair value through other comprehensive income. <b>(V)</b></li> </ul>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>For unlisted investments (other than subsidiaries, associates or joint ventures) ensure they are accounted for at fair value through profit or loss unless their fair value cannot be reliably measured.<b> (V)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>For listed investments confirm that all dividends and interest receivable have been accounted for and that ‘dirty pricing’ has not occurred. <b> (V)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Where investments are not carried at fair value, consider whether there is any indication that investments are impaired. (This could involve a review recent financial statements or budgets, or where there is significant concern, obtaining an expert valuation.) <b> (V)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Where those charged with governance conclude that non-listed investments (other than subsidiaries, associates or joint ventures) cannot be reliably measured on a fair value basis obtain confirmation of this in the letter of representation. Consider the reasonableness of the arguments put forward to rebut the presumption that most investments can fair valued. (Ideally those charged with governance should produce a ‘paper’ to support the accounting treatment adopted). <b> (V)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Where non-listed investments have been fair valued, obtain details of the valuation prepared either by those charged with governance or an expert. <b> (V)</b></p>\r\n<p>NB: Details of the valuation model used and key assumptions must be disclosed in the financial statements. <b>(D)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Where an expert’s valuation has been obtained to support the value of an investment held at fair value or as part of an impairment review, undertake the appropriate audit tests on the N audit programme.<b> (V)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Where valuations are based on a directors’ valuation, review the appropriateness of the valuation model used and the assumptions made.<b> (V)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Consider investment performance post period end to confirm no substantial fall in valuation. <b> (P)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Ascertain whether investments have been placed as collateral or security by inspecting reports from the investment custodian, loan agreements, minutes etc. <b> (P)</b></p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>List and perform any additional tests considered necessary.</p>', '', '', '', '2.3 D2', '2.3 D2', '17', 'Active', '2024-04-09 20:56:02')

post.question:
Array
(
    [0] => <p>Obtain a schedule of investments, split between investments in group undertakings and other investments.  <b>(P)</b></p>
    [1] => <p>Agree totals shown on the lead schedule to the trial balance and register of investments. <b>(E)</b></p>
    [2] => <p>Agree comparative figures to the previous period’s statutory financial statements. <b>(V)</b></p>
    [3] => <p>Review investments for reasonableness and consistency. Consider whether any debt instrument included within investments would be more appropriately classified as debtors. <b>(C, E &P)</b></p>
    [4] => <p>Revisit the risk assessment, materiality calculation and assignment plan and update as appropriate where matters have been identified during the assignment.</p>
    [5] => <p>Ensure key findings from this section are included in the draft letter of representation, points for the management letter and points for A.E.P.’s attention.</p>
    [6] => <p>Ensure that the conclusion is appropriate.<b>(P)</b></p>
    [7] => <p>If available, consider obtaining the Type 2 Report from the investment manager(s) or custodian(s).  Review the report(s) and based on the assurance obtained on the effectiveness and reliability of the controls in place, consider the extent to which tests 9 to 12 need to be completed.  Ensure that the relevant tests on the N section Audit Programme have been completed to document consideration of the use of a service organisation. <b>(E, R&O, C, V)</b></p>
    [8] => <p>Agree shareholdings to share certificates or other suitable documentation. <b>(E, R & O)</b></p>
<i>This test is required for subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates, as well as other investments.</i>
    [9] => <p>Check a sample of purchases to supporting documentation.<b>(E, R & O)</b></p>
    [10] => <p>Check a sample of disposals to contract notes and bank receipts, and ensure that the profit / loss has been correctly calculated. <b>(C, V)</b></p>
    [11] => <p>For listed investments which must be carried at fair value, vouch period end values to published data using ‘bid’ prices. <b> (V)</b></p>
    [12] => <p>Check whether items denoted in a foreign currency have been translated at the correct rate. <b> (V)</b></p>
    [13] => <p>Ensure the audit file justifies the classification of investments as: subsidiaries, associates, joint ventures and other investments. <b>(D, V).</b></p>
    [14] => <p>For investments in subsidiaries, associates and joint venture ensure that the entity has valued them at either:-</p>
<ul>
    <li>Cost; or</li>
    <li>Fair value through profit or loss; or</li>
    <li>Fair value through other comprehensive income. <b>(V)</b></li>
</ul>
    [15] => <p>For unlisted investments (other than subsidiaries, associates or joint ventures) ensure they are accounted for at fair value through profit or loss unless their fair value cannot be reliably measured.<b> (V)</b></p>
    [16] => <p>For listed investments confirm that all dividends and interest receivable have been accounted for and that ‘dirty pricing’ has not occurred. <b> (V)</b></p>

    [18] => <p>Where those charged with governance conclude that non-listed investments (other than subsidiaries, associates or joint ventures) cannot be reliably measured on a fair value basis obtain confirmation of this in the letter of representation.  Consider the reasonableness of the arguments put forward to rebut the presumption that most investments can fair valued. (Ideally those charged with governance should produce a ‘paper’ to support the accounting treatment adopted). <b> (V)</b></p>
    [19] => <p>Where non-listed investments have been fair valued, obtain details of the valuation prepared either by those charged with governance or an expert. <b> (V)</b></p>
<p>NB: Details of the valuation model used and key assumptions must be disclosed in the financial statements.  <b>(D)</b></p>
    [20] => <p>Where an expert’s valuation has been obtained to support the value of an investment held at fair value or as part of an impairment review, undertake the appropriate audit tests on the N audit programme.<b> (V)</b></p>
    [21] => <p>Where valuations are based on a directors’ valuation, review the appropriateness of the valuation model used and the assumptions made.<b> (V)</b></p>
    [22] => <p>Consider investment performance post period end to confirm no substantial fall in valuation. <b> (P)</b></p>
    [23] => <p>Ascertain whether investments have been placed as collateral or security by inspecting reports from the investment custodian, loan agreements, minutes etc. <b> (P)</b></p>
    [24] => <p>List and perform any additional tests considered necessary.</p>
)
